title: Liz Truss – 2022 Speech to Conservative Spring Conference
author: admin
summary: The speech made by Liz Truss, the Foreign Secretary, in Blackpool on 19 March 2022.
content:
As we meet here in Blackpool, we face a different world from the one we have known over the past decades.
